document.full_text: a rescue deal for saab involving china's hawtai motor group collapsed on thursday, leaving owner spyker chasing new funding alternatives to restart production at the swedish carmaker.
document.title: spyker hit by breakdown of saab's chinese rescue
lines_and_colors: a rescue deal for saab involving china's hawtai motor group collapsed on thursday, leaving owner spyker chasing new funding alternatives to restart production at the swedish carmaker.
